_xResult.title: My Feathers Ruffle Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made party dress with ruffles
_xResult.longdesc:
If you are looking for a "wow" custom made dress to dazzle a party, this is your lucky day.  The fabric texture feels like flower petals, covered from top to bottom with soft ruffles that beg to be touched. It hugs your curves in all the right places, and feels so comfortable to wear!

 

Choose your color for the desired effect: little black dress, powerful  classic blue, or oh-my-gosh-red.  The dress length can be changed, plus the sleeve lengths as well. Be the highlight of your next soiré—this dress will make it easy.

 

Available colors include red, blue and black. If you've never experienced having a dress made custom to your measurements, you'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!
